#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;

int main(){

    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){

        string s;
        cin>>s;
        int l=s.length(),sum=0;

        for(int i=0;i<l;i++){
            sum+=s[i];
        }
        char c=sum/l;
        cout<<c<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
